document.full_text: the family of anton hammerl, a south african photojournalist who has been missing since early last month, said that they think he died after being shot on april 5 in the desert.
document.title: missing photographer in libya is presumed dead
lines_and_colors: the family of anton hammerl, a south african photojournalist who has been missing since early last month, said that they think he died after being shot on april 5 in the desert.
